episodes.synopsis: It was a concentration camp whose name became a byword for the mass murder of Jews. However, Auschwitz was originally intended for another purpose.
episodes.title: Surprising Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: By 1942, Auschwitz was established as a place to murder thousands of people, but the horrific Nazi regime demanded yet more be killed.
episodes.title: Orders and Initiatives

episodes.synopsis: France was the first western country to deport resident Jews to Auschwitz. This led to the biggest killing year in the history of the Nazis.
episodes.title: Factories of Death

episodes.synopsis: Eyewitnesses recall how those in power stole from Jewish inmates, and how inmates were the subjects of horrific experiments.
episodes.title: Corruption

episodes.synopsis: The German occupation of Hungary leads to the deportation of Jews living there. The Western Allies debate whether to bomb the camp.
episodes.title: Murder and Intrigue

episodes.synopsis: Red Army soldiers liberate the concentration camp, but are not warned about its existence in advance. They are utterly shocked by what they find.
episodes.title: Liberation and Revenge

video.title: Auschwitz: Inside the Nazi State
video.synopsis: This documentary series tackles one of history's most disquieting subjects: the Holocaust and the infamous Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp.
